channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ons Jabeur, Three-Time Grand Slam Finalist, To ‘Step Back’ From Tennis
item.description: Ons Jabeur, two-time Wimbledon runner-up, posted on X that she is taking a break from tennis, saying she hasn’t felt happy on the court for some time.

item.title: Netflix Is Making An Assassin’s Creed’ Show, Which Game Will Be Adapted?
item.description: Netflix has announced that it will make an Assassin's Creed live-action show with Ubisoft. So which game are we talking about here?

item.title: How To Lower Your Electric Bill With A Super-Smart Thermal Battery
item.description: A Wi-Fi connection and a very clever water heater can save you money and cut your carbon footprint while increasing grid efficiency and resilience.

item.title: ‘Cyberpunk 2077’ Update 2.3 Patch Notes – Manage Expectations
item.description: Here is the long list of patch notes for Cyberpunk 2077 Update 2.3, and fans need to understand the scale of these patches.

item.title: Mr. Fantastic Will Lead The Avengers In ‘Doomsday’ – What About Sam And Yelena?
item.description: The director of Fantastic Four is saying the Mr. Fantastic, Reed Richards, will lead The Avengers. What about the other teams?
